code: import React from'react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./OrderConfirmation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OrderConfirmation(){const location=useLocation();const{name,address,email,phone,cart}=location.state;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-confirmation-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Order Confirmation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Thank you for your order, ",name,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your order will be delivered to:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["We will contact you at ",email," or ",phone," if we have any questions."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Order Details:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.name," - $",item.price]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total: $",cart.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.price,0).toFixed(2)]})]});}export default OrderConfirmation;
